english.segment1: When the Christmas time draws near. We think of joys and Christmas cheer. Of Santa with his reindeer and his sleigh
english.segment2: But long ago, we should recall. The Bethlehem Babe was born for all. To show the world the life, the truth, the way
english.segment3: The spirit of Christmas is the spirit of Love. It's something that you cannot buy. It's something from above
english.segment4: The presents that you give and get. Are nothing but a token. For if they don't come filled with love. The Christmas spirit's broken
english.segment5: Just singing Christmas carols and. Just ringing Jingle Bells. Means nothing if you do not know. The story that it tells
english.segment6: So, 'midst the din and tinsel as you. Trim the Christmas tree. Let a newborn love enfold you. Embrace you, uphold you. That's the true idea of Christmas. That's what Christmas means to me.
